song_lyrics: Akṣhar par ānandghan Prabhu, kiyo haibhūparṭhām;
Jehī milat jantaratmāyā, lahat Akshardhām... poḍhe 1
Shārad Shesh Mahesh mahāmuni, japat jehī guṇnām;
Jās padraj shīsh dharī dharī, hot jan nishkām... poḍhe 2
Muktānand nij charaṇḍhigguṇ, gāvat āṭhu jām... poḍhe 3
title: Poḍhe Prabhu sakal munike Shyām

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-183: Sadguru Muktanand Swami

Category: Leela Chintamani
